nodes.long_description:
Eat your friends in 'SHARKS' a cross-platform (PC and VR) multiplayer hunting game. Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins. It's like Gorilla Tag with sharks.

The VR controls are super responsive (it feels like a human-shark mind meld): simply look where you want the shark to swim. Pull the trigger to move forward, press the grip button to chomp/eat things.
nodes.short_description: Eat your friends in 'SHARKS' a cross-platform (PC and VR) multiplayer hunting game. Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins. It's like Gorilla Tag with sharks.

nodes.change_log:
Release Notes - v0.1.28 - LOBBY FIX

A quick fix to make sure the lobby lists all active rooms. See you in there!

New:
- Premium outfits now listed in the inventory

Fixes:
- Lobby displays all active rooms
- Camera getting stuck under the ground fix
- Default game mode set to Zombie Tag
- Update banned players remotely

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.27 - GOLD GRILLZ

Get your free legendary 'Gold Grillz' for a limited time only!

New:
- Free legendary 'Gold Grillz' for a limited time only
- Sharks displaced by explosion impacts
- Sharks can't bite other sharks while carrying an item
- Easier to put on purchased skins

Fixes:
- Made the Shark Shop more central in the Original map
- Local player name added to HUD
- Code to unlock moderator status
- If a player is banned, they can't be banned again until the ban wears off

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.26 - MORE TREASURE

Collect hidden treasures and send them up to the FIN-TASIC SALVAGE COMPANY for a reward: will you work together, or make it every shark for themselves?

New:
- More salvage items: alien tech, arcade machines, boom boxes, torpedos, ovens
- Honkers! Play beautiful(?) music together on the Original map
- Goldfish restore health
- Treasures added to the sunken ship on the Original map

Fixes:
- Voice chat banned players check
- Lobby room list refresh
- Fix for respawns if room master changes
- Louder salvage company chatter

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.25 - COMPANY FIX

Collect hidden treasures and send them up for a reward: will you work together, or make it every shark for themselves?

The FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY is now open for business! Search all around for items to collect and put them in the reward cage. When you've collected enough treasure send it up for a reward. But watch out! When the reward arrives it's first in best dressed: anyone can claim the prize, so do whatever it takes to get there first.

We've also added proximity chat and private rooms, so you can play and chat with your friends. To enable voice chat you will need to give the game permission to use your microphone. When using voice chat please be respectful and considerate to other players - anyone who doesn't risks being banned from the game.

If you own a premium skin (like the Founders or Squidian Skins) you can create private rooms with a custom PIN that you can provide to your friends so they can join you (note: friends don't need to own a premium skin to join your private room).

New:
- More salvage items: aliens, divers and gnomes
- Voice volume added to 'Mute' menu

Fixes:
- Reward cage not returning bug fix
- Adjusted base voice volume

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie

Release Notes - v0.1.24 - "THE FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY"

Collect hidden treasures and send them up for a reward: will you work together, or make it every shark for themselves?

The FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY is now open for business! Search all around for items to collect and put them in the reward cage. When you've collected enough treasure send it up for a reward. But watch out! When the reward arrives it's first in best dressed: anyone can claim the prize, so do whatever it takes to get there first.

We've also added proximity chat and private rooms, so you can play and chat with your friends. To enable voice chat you will need to give the game permission to use your microphone. When using voice chat please be respectful and considerate to other players - anyone who doesn't risks being banned from the game.

If you own a premium skin (like the Founders or Squidian Skins) you can create private rooms with a custom PIN that you can provide to your friends so they can join you (note: friends don't need to own a premium skin to join your private room).

New:
- The FIN-TASTIC SALVAGE COMPANY is open for business
- Tons of new salvage items to collect for rewards
- Proximity voice chat: talk with friends while playing
- Shark mouth moves while talking
- Mute menu: Ability to mute players
- Private rooms: anyone with the PIN can join a private multiplayer room
- Premium skin perk: create private multiplayer rooms
- Premium skin perk: reward chests recharge instantly
- Wearing the VR goggles now doubles some rewards
- More environmental sounds (when objects bump into sharks and each other)
- Networked biteable doors: open and close them with your mouth
- Reward cage: fill with items and send up for a reward
- Reward goldfish: anyone can get them!
- Random salvage items spawn in
- Controller haptics when biting and taking damage

Fixes:
- Terms of Service agreement on start-up
- Lobby always shows a room option
- Sandcastle: added random goldfish
- Sandcastle: expanded area
- Sandcastle: updated lighting
- Settings: Master volume control
- Settings: Voice volume control
- Limited cannons per map
- Cannon firing tweaked
- Adjusted mouse sensitivity for flat-screen version
- Items in the reward cage can pass through the water surface layer
- Levers changed to biteable horns
- Moved Audio Listener to the shark's head (rather than the camera)

If you love playing SHARKS then buy some skins or get a goldfish pack to show your support. All proceeds go right back into the game: new game modes, customizable items, maps, interactable creatures and objects and multiplayer servers.

Thanks so much for playing and please tell your friends: word of mouth is the best way to get more players in the game!

If you have any feedback or comments, please come chat in the Discord (https://ezone.com/discord). Cheers!

- Simon and Jamie
